questionTitle: The train drivers strike made it impossible for us .......... to work.
I don't see any ............... in arriving early at the theatre if the show doesn't start until 9 o'clock.
I will return your books as soon as ................ copying them.
This salad is not much ................ the others that I have tried .
I was enjoying my book, but I stopped .............. a program on TV.
His grandfather, ........ health hadn't been good recently, was taken into hospital.
Mr. John used to take part in a chess club, ................?
In front of my school, there is a big park ................. old people often do morning exercises.
You must listen to the English news, ................?
Peter needs to see the doctor, ................?
The food was so hot; it was still .......... when it reached us.
Your mother might have gone out, ................?
They moved their house ................ the noise of the trains.
I'd ................ the operation unless it is absolutely necessary.
Both Mai and Hoa, ................ Lan, are studying nursing at this College.
Certain ................. are stronger than others on the international market.
